DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study characterize pharmacokinetics TV-45070 plasma follow single multiple-dose topical application 8 % TV-45070 ointment .
DOC.brief_title: Study Characterize Pharmacokinetics Safety TV-45070 Ointment Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 50 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥18.0 ≤32.0 kg/m2 . Able willing provide write informed consent . Able willing comply study procedure restriction . History evidence clinically significant illness surgery Presence open wound , sunburn , tattoo , major scarring , nonintact damage propose application area would interfere application study drug treatment biopsy . History significant drug alcohol abuse Use prescription drug within 30 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior Day 1 . Use topical application OTC medicate prescription medication skin creams/ointments ( eg , moisturizers , balm ) area intend study drug administration within 7 day prior Day 1 . Use topical capsaicin within 6 month prior Day 1 . Pregnant nursing female Shaving wax plan study treatment application area within 7 day prior Day 1 . Laser hair removal plan study treatment application area within 2 month prior Day 1. criterion apply , please contact investigator information
